de.esoco.ewt.component

Class TableControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.component.Component
      • de.esoco.ewt.component.Control
        • de.esoco.ewt.component.TableControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.HasId<java.lang.String>, de.esoco.lib.property.SingleSelection, de.esoco.lib.property.TitleAttribute
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Table, TreeTable

    public abstract class TableControl
extends Control
implements de.esoco.lib.property.SingleSelection, de.esoco.lib.property.TitleAttribute
    Base class for GEWT table controls.

      • setColumns

        public void setColumns(de.esoco.lib.model.DataModel<de.esoco.lib.model.ColumnDefinition> rColumnModel)
        Sets the table columns. The columns are defined in form of a data model that must contain one data element for each table column.
        Parameters:
        rColumnModel - The table column data model

      • setData

        public void setData(de.esoco.lib.model.DataModel<? extends de.esoco.lib.model.DataModel<?>> rDataModel)
        Sets the table's data model. The data elements of the model will be displayed as the rows of the table. They must also implement the interface DataModel and provide the table cells as their elements.
        Parameters:
        rDataModel - The data model for this table

      • createEventDispatcher

        protected Component.ComponentEventDispatcher createEventDispatcher()
        Description copied from class: Component
        This method must be overridden by subclasses that support additional event types. The return value must be an instance of a subclass of the class Component.ComponentEventDispatcher which will handle the mapping from GWT to EWT events for this widget instance. This default implementation returns an instance of the base class that will handle default events.
        Returns:
        A new event dispatcher instance
        See Also:
        Component.createEventDispatcher()
